Login.emailRequiredLabel: Enter a valid Email or Phone Number

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.description: Enter your email address or phone number bellow and we'll send you an-email to reset it.
ForgotPassword.errorUsernameNotFound: Patient with the given Email or Phone number not found. Please make sure that you entered it correctly and try again
ForgotPassword.errorInValidUserameOrPhone: Enter a valid Email or Phone Number
ForgotPassword.errorInvalidEmailPhone: Enter a valid Email or Phone Number

PasswordSecurityQuestion.title: Password Recovery Security Questions
PasswordSecurityQuestion.subtitle: Answer the following questions to reset your password.
PasswordSecurityQuestion.errorAccountLock: Your account is locked. Please contact customer support to unlock your account

ForgotPasswordPage.subtitlePasswordReset: Choose a mode of communication where we should send you the link to reset your password.
ForgotPasswordPage.linkSentToPhonePasswordReset: Link sent to your phone number
ForgotPasswordPage.descriptionPasswordReset: If you did not receive the link, try to answer security questions.
ForgotPasswordPage.descriptionPasswordResetSuccess: If you did not receive the link, try to login with one-time link
ForgotPasswordPage.subtitleOneTime: Choose a mode of communication where we should send you the magic link.
ForgotPasswordPage.subtitleOneTimeSuccess: Click on the one-time link sent to your email or phone number to access your account.
ForgotPasswordPage.descriptionOneTime: Click on the one-time link sent to your email or phone number to access your account

ValidatePage.expiredPostmessageResetPassword: Reset Password link has been expired

mfaPage.setMFADescription: Select a delivery method to identify your identity.
mfaPage.setMFAEmailDescription: Confirm your email below and we’ll send a code to set-up multi-factor authentication.
mfaPage.setMFAPhoneDescription: Confirm your phone below and we’ll send a code to set-up multi-factor authentication.
mfaPage.mfaDescription: A verification code has been sent. Enter code below
mfaPage.rememberMeDescription: This means you won't have to authenticate at every sign-in
mfaPage.mfaLockDescription: Please try setting up multi factor authentication after 30 minutes.
mfaPage.resendCodeLockDescription: Code sent multiple times. Please try again after 30 minutes.

scheduleAppoinment.passwordInfo: Create a password to have access to your dashboard, manage, and track your appointment details.
scheduleAppoinment.thanksBar: Thank you for scheduling your appointment. We will send a confirmation Email/Text shortly.
